channel.title: Dragon History AMAZING 317! Highscore, All skills work! FULL PK!@
channel.description:
oh well, i guess i made it here are all the updates (most still the same) :
Updates in Dragon-History X : -Games Neck + Glory teleporting added -Highscore Added -Skillcape Emote added -Thieving stall level 1 is now magic stall -WIldy fixed -Trade fixed -Pest control -new lava -Edgeville improved -New npc -Armadyl godwars -Zamorak godwars -Bandos godwars -Summoning added (not completed yet) -Construction added -Combat 138 with summoning added -Items kept on death interface added -Equipment interface added -New teleports added -New teleport Gfx added -Teletabs added -Vesta, statius etc armor added -Daganohai armor added -Summoning monsters added -New background added -Highscore added -rare shop added (with correct prices) -Summoning pouches added -Summoning skillcape added -Build new system for skillcapes, nto very good, but its better than the one that people got. -Fixed map -Castle wars fixed now -Clan wars fixed -Most npc got new drops, as people asked me. -New quest added (really sweet -NEw commands -Unlimited run -Anti Dupe -Anti Allgofreebot -Magic Guild Added -Warrior Guild -Npc following -Construction with shortcuts -Combat 138 if you get 99 summoning -Some glitches removed -Added beter clan chat system not 100% yet. -New quest for dragon claws -Tormented Demon added -Added Total Gameplay -Added p hat shop -Added game neck and glory they both work -Reset defence or any other skills can work in source. -Ingame Highscore added (admins dont count)
ps: For construction you will have to type ::construction command to start construct because you can't construct in edgeville or other city's, cuz it would block players from the objects
Dragon-Histroy Client X updated: -No more black areas -Fixed Cache -Added All PVP armor -Added dagonhai -Made new decorations in edgeville and other city's -Items kept on deaht interface -Item equipement interface with bonusses -All npcdialogues should work now with evry helm etc... -Resized the size of class8
------------------------------------------------------------
Information u should know:
Server is set up on 43594 port Same for the client Localhost = 127.0.0.1
Some Commands :
(these still need testing so they might not work) :xgive just gives a player an item. If it's GP, it'll give 1 mil. You can just trade the player, but if you just want to force the player to take something, you can use this!
::giveall Gives every player an item, and I mean every player online. If you have any players you want to give something to and you miss them or they log, tough luck. This command can be pretty useful though.
::xtake Instantly peruses through a player's inventory and bank. If it finds the item you want to take, BAM! It's gone. Useful if you find a player has an item you don't want him to have. oh yes, if it "takes" any stackable item, it will take all of it.
::takeall if you think about it, takeall could be kind of like a cleaning method! you could clear all players' banks' and inventories' of any admin items without searching to see if a player has an admin only item or not.
::construction ::reset ::dog1 ::dog2 :titan1 ::titan2 ::mystats ::compareips ::dismiss (THIS IS TO REMOVE YOUR PET FROM SERVER) ::highscores and alot more just check it out yourself ------------------------------------------------------------- What I am working on? -WHEN you log out the npc you summoned died (95%) -Pest control - Done -Better barrows system : Spade dig on each hill, realistic barrows hit, realistic rewards. 50% -New minigame - done -I want to add like 20-30 new models in the new client. 50% -More Monsters. 70% -Portal chambre.35% -Castle wars. 90% Done -Duel arena.50% -Funpk area. 100% Done -Anti syipkpker. Done -Chinchompa like real rs. done -Construction. 70% -New quest. Done -Summoning. 50% -Clan wars. 90% -New custom minigame (only for skillers) <----this will be made 100% in the next update -Going to add New ogre minigame -farming Improving 40% -Cooking improving 30% -mod island 20% and alot more !
ps: I'm sorry to the people i couldn't help because i was in hard time, had exams and other stuff going on irl so i wasn't really active,so i apoligize for that, but now i should be back i hope Any questions? feel free to pm me, Find any glitch? pm me i will fix.Thanks you and happy downloading.
And now what evryone loves tatatataaaaa.............. PICTURES !:D New attack emote [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2i1mfbn.jpg[/img] Levelup Interface is perfect [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/23jmuzk.jpg[/img] Combat 138 with 99 summoning! [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/205telf.jpg[/img] Armadyl Boss [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/28c0br4.jpg[/img] Items kept on Death working in wildy! [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/ou48sy.jpg[/img] New Telleport like real RS! [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2hfjhg5.jpg[/img]
NO NEGATIVE COMMENTS! If you like, +rep is always appreciated
Credits: 50%Delta 50% luck
DOWNLOAD LINK::: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=0ZZ47TJE

item.title: Dragon History AMAZING 317! Highscore, All skills work! FULL PK!@
item.dc:creator: @onizak onizak
item.description:
@onizak wrote:

oh well, i guess i made it here are all the updates (most still the same) :

Updates in Dragon-History X :
-Games Neck + Glory teleporting added
-Highscore Added
-Skillcape Emote added
-Thieving stall level 1 is now magic stall
-WIldy fixed
-Trade fixed
-Pest control
-new lava
-Edgeville improved
-New npc
-Armadyl godwars
-Zamorak godwars
-Bandos godwars
-Summoning added (not completed yet)
-Construction added
-Combat 138 with summoning added
-Items kept on death interface added
-Equipment interface added
-New teleports added
-New teleport Gfx added
-Teletabs added
-Vesta, statius etc armor added
-Daganohai armor added
-Summoning monsters added
-New background added
-Highscore added
-rare shop added (with correct prices)
-Summoning pouches added
-Summoning skillcape added
-Build new system for skillcapes, nto very good, but its better than the
one that people got.
-Fixed map
-Castle wars fixed now
-Clan wars fixed
-Most npc got new drops, as people asked me.
-New quest added (really sweet
-NEw commands
-Unlimited run
-Anti Dupe
-Anti Allgofreebot
-Magic Guild Added
-Warrior Guild
-Npc following
-Construction with shortcuts
-Combat 138 if you get 99 summoning
-Some glitches removed
-Added beter clan chat system not 100% yet.
-New quest for dragon claws
-Tormented Demon added
-Added Total Gameplay
-Added p hat shop
-Added game neck and glory they both work
-Reset defence or any other skills can work in source.
-Ingame Highscore added (admins dont count)

ps: For construction you will have to type ::construction command to start construct because you can’t construct in edgeville or other city’s, cuz it would block players from the objects

Dragon-Histroy Client X updated:
-No more black areas
-Fixed Cache
-Added All PVP armor
-Added dagonhai
-Made new decorations in edgeville and other city’s
-Items kept on deaht interface
-Item equipement interface with bonusses
-All npcdialogues should work now with evry helm etc…
-Resized the size of class8

Information u should know:

Server is set up on 43594 port
Same for the client
Localhost = 127.0.0.1

Some Commands :

(these still need testing so they might not work)
:xgive just gives a player an item. If it’s GP, it’ll give 1 mil. You can just trade the player, but if you just want to force the player to take something, you can use this!

::giveall Gives every player an item, and I mean every player online. If you have any players you want to give something to and you miss them or they log, tough luck. This command can be pretty useful though.

::xtake Instantly peruses through a player’s inventory and bank. If it finds the item you want to take, BAM! It’s gone. Useful if you find a player has an item you don’t want him to have. oh yes, if it “takes” any stackable item, it will take all of it.

::takeall if you think about it, takeall could be kind of like a cleaning method! you could clear all players’ banks’ and inventories’ of any admin items without searching to see if a player has an admin only item or not.

::construction
::reset
::dog1
::dog2
:titan1
::titan2
::mystats
::compareips
::dismiss (THIS IS TO REMOVE YOUR PET FROM SERVER)
::highscores
and alot more just check it out yourself

What I am working on?
-WHEN you log out the npc you summoned died (95%)
-Pest control - Done
-Better barrows system : Spade dig on each hill, realistic barrows hit, realistic rewards. 50%
-New minigame - done
-I want to add like 20-30 new models in the new client. 50%
-More Monsters. 70%
-Portal chambre.35%
-Castle wars. 90% Done
-Duel arena.50%
-Funpk area. 100% Done
-Anti syipkpker. Done
-Chinchompa like real rs. done
-Construction. 70%
-New quest. Done
-Summoning. 50%
-Clan wars. 90%
-New custom minigame (only for skillers) <----this will be made 100% in the next update
-Going to add New ogre minigame
-farming Improving 40%
-Cooking improving 30%
-mod island 20%
and alot more !

ps: I’m sorry to the people i couldn’t help because i was in hard time, had exams and other stuff going on irl so i wasn’t really active,so i apoligize for that, but now i should be back i hope Any questions? feel free to pm me, Find any glitch? pm me i will fix.Thanks you and happy downloading.

And now what evryone loves tatatataaaaa… PICTURES !
New attack emote

2i1mfbn.jpg960×540

Levelup Interface is perfect
23jmuzk.jpg960×540

Combat 138 with 99 summoning!
205telf.jpg960×540

Armadyl Boss
28c0br4.jpg960×540

Items kept on Death working in wildy!
ou48sy.jpg960×540

New Telleport like real RS!
2hfjhg5.jpg960×540

NO NEGATIVE COMMENTS!
If you like, +rep is always appreciated

Credits:
50%Delta
50% luck

http://www.megaupload.com/?d=0ZZ47TJE
